alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 11:55PM HST until January 17 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING CANCELLED FOR INTERIOR AND WINDWARD KAUAI AND OAHU... ...WIND ADVISORY CANCELLED FOR NIIHAU LEEWARD KAUAI LEEWARD OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI AND LOWER ELEVATIONS OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE HIGHEST SUMMITS OF THE BIG ISLAND AND MOUNT HALEAKALA ON MAUI... .Strong southwest winds on the summits of the Big Island and the Haleakala Summit will continue through Wednesday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...On the Big Island summits, southwest winds increasing to 55 to 75 mph with higher gusts. On the high summit of Haleakala on Maui, southwest winds increasing to 50 to 60 mph with higher gusts. * WHERE...The high summits of the Big Island and Haleakala on Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
